about-me.title: About me
about-me.first-text: Hi, I’m a german speaking Frontend Developer based near Munich. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about-me.location-text: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Munich and remotely.
about-me.lightbulb-text: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about-me.puzzle-text: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

my-skills.title: My skills
my-skills.first-text: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
my-skills.second-text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

my-portfolio.title: Portfolio
my-portfolio.first-text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
my-portfolio.pokedex-text: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
my-portfolio.elp-text: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
my-portfolio.join-text: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
my-portfolio.dabubble-text: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

my-contact.title: Contact
my-contact.first-text: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
my-contact.privacy-text: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
